summary: This bill, the "No Union Time on the Taxpayer's Dime Act," aims to prevent federal employees from using "official time" (paid time) to conduct union business. It amends Title 5 of the United States Code to mandate that any union-related activities be done during the employee's non-duty time. The bill was introduced in the Senate by Mr. Lee and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs in April 2025.
